snippet.title: Lou's Lagoon - Official Gameplay Teaser Trailer | Games Baked in Germany Showcase
snippet.description:
Launch from the sea and take to the skies! Lou’s Lagoon is a cozy open world adventure where you make friends and uncover secrets across a gorgeous archipelago. Your uncle Lou left his seaplane delivery service in your hands, so now it’s up to you to keep the business afloat – and figure out what happened to Lou. Collect, harvest, fish, craft and trade various goods, then deliver them safely to the individual islands in your trusty seaplane. Customize and strengthen your plane over time to overcome storms in order to reach new islanders. Forge new connections and service your community.

Lou's Lagoon is coming soon to PC (Steam) with a Kickstarter available now. Visit Steam and add it to your wishlist now: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2100020/Lous_Lagoon/
